text: Reviewed and moderated all uploaded before final uploading stage
Made sure all online content followed guidelimnes and policys
Resolved issues, improved operations and provided exception service
Curated team communications and information for meetings
Volume reports - physical shop, online, events etc.
Developed and maintained effective working relationship with partners through phone, email, text msg and post.
Two months of extensive GPlay, hardware, Google for families and Google one training with various test and assesments
Agent of tier 1 giving technical support to Google customers via email, phone and chat.
Tracked my progress and satisfaction rate to further develop and grow satisfaction rate
